title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 44.1 - General meaning of utility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 44.1 - General meaning of utility

State Regulations

Utility, as used in the law, is given a broader meaning
than the word usually implies. Those subject to the tax are divided into two
classes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
44.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
